title: Interpretation of offering roses in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Today we present to you the interpretation of a gift of roses in a dream. A gift of roses is a kind of expression of good feelings for others, and different types of roses and their colors express different feelings, but what does a dream about roses mean? Giving roses in a dream? For a man, a woman and a single girl, we will learn in this article from the encyclopedia the different interpretations of these dreams. Follow usInterpretation of a gift of roses in a dreamGiving roses in a dream to a married womanIf a married woman sees that her husband is giving her flowers, this is good news that her husband brings her love and affection. And if a woman feels happy in her dream about receiving these flowers, this is good news for her, that she will be greatly relieved from what she is suffering, and God will reconcile them and improve their conditions. Giving roses in a dream to a pregnant womanOne of the praiseworthy visions for a pregnant woman is to see someone giving her roses, as it is good news that God will ease her pregnancy and give birth to her child in the best health and wellness, and she will not face it. Any health problems, God willing, during her pregnancy. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving flowers to someone, this vision shows the friendliness and love that this woman has for this person and the depth of the good relations between them. Giving roses in a dream to a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that someone gave her white roses, this means that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from a person with high morals and spirit. When an unmarried girl sees that she is giving someone a bouquet of roses, this vision indicates the girl's desire to marry that person. If the roses are red, this vision is a warning to her that there is someone who is pursuing her and wants to harm her, or that there is a man who will propose to her, but this man will not be her suitable husband and you will not. Live with him in misery and sadness. And if a stranger gives roses to a single girl in her dream, this dream warns the girl against dealing with strangers whom she does not know well, because there are those who want evil for her, and it was said that the interpretation of this vision is that this girl is being deceived by someone who misleads her with love, so she must warn him and stay away from him immediately. Whoever sees in her dream that she is putting roses on the grave of a dead person, this girl is burdened with painful memories that she cannot get rid of, so continue with her life. Giving roses in a dream to a man If a man sees in his dream that he is giving a woman red roses, this dream shows the man's deep desire to communicate with this woman and marry her, but he cannot tell her about it. And when he dreams that he is giving her white roses, this indicates his desire to establish a good friendship between him and this woman and that he has all feelings of appreciation and respect for her. If a man sees in his dream that he is giving flowers to his family, this vision shows the good feelings he feels towards them, as well as the depth of family ties between them and means that the dreamer is interested in the bond of mercy.

title: More than 20 interpretations of seeing a dream about twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins in a dream by leading scholars. The interpretation and interpretation of a dream or seeing twins varies according to the dreamer and his circumstances and depending on whether the twins are male or female or if they are male and female twins, but in the end, seeing children in a dream is a good vision unless otherwise indicated. In a dream, it is a gift from God. What is the interpretation of a dream about twins? If the dreamer is in a romantic relationship, seeing this may indicate that this relationship will fail or that it is going down a wrong and wrong path and may also indicate that the dreamer may succeed in his work and achieve his ambitions. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving birth to twins, this may indicate God’s satisfaction and closeness to him and that God will respond and fulfill his desire. If the dreamer is already pregnant and sees that she is giving birth to male twins, this may indicate that after giving birth she will suffer from strong and difficult pain. But if She saw in her dream that she was giving birth to twins, a female, then this may indicate that she will give birth to a boy, and that he will stress her life in the first months after his birth. However, if a man sees his wife in his dream that she has given birth to twins, a male and a female, this may mean that he is spending his money on unnecessary things. Although he works hard to collect this money, when he sees that his wife has given birth to triplets, this may be evidence that he is tormented by disagreement, followed by joy, happiness, and pleasure. As for the interpretation of twins in a young man’s dream, this vision could be evidence of his peace of mind, the tranquility of his bed, and the comfort of his life. His stomach, but if a young man sees triplets of twins, this could indicate that. Problems with whoever he is related to will be resolved if he is single, and in another interpretation it could be an announcement of success and the fulfillment of his ambitions. If the dreamer sees twins, a boy and a girl, this may mean that he has to pay a sum of money to someone in his house and ask him for help. The Egyptian website is The largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. What is the interpretation of twins in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl sees that she is giving birth to male twins, this may indicate that Satan is controlling her. Her thinking, and that she will do things that lead her to the path of disobedience, God forbid. If the dreamer sees that she has given birth to twins, a male and a female, this may mean that the man she loves will ask for her hand in marriage, but this relationship will face many problems and will not last long, and may break up before the wedding arrives. But if an unmarried woman sees that she has given birth to twins, this may indicate her closeness to God. What is the interpretation of twins in a dream for Al-Osaimi? Sheikh Saleh Al-Osaimi believes that if a married woman sees that she is pregnant with twins, this may indicate that she has overcome difficult obstacles in her life and She is about to achieve many successes in her life projects that she is working on. If twins are seen in a dream having fun and playing together, and they feel cheerful and happy, then this is a positive vision and indicates happy news and a lot of nourishment. But if the dreamer sees twins having

title: Interpretation of seeing Pharaoh in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Pharaoh in a dream or dream, and the Pharaoh is the ancient Egyptian, and the interpreters differed regarding seeing the Pharaoh in a dream or seeing statues, as it can indicate wealth and wealth and can show anxiety, sorrow and troubles, and you will explain this in detail. The interpretation of seeing the Pharaoh in a dream by providing interpretations To see in a dream a man, a married woman, a pregnant woman, an unmarried girl, as well as a divorced woman and a man. By presenting the interpretations of the great imams in interpreting visions and dreams, ancient and modern, follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing Pharaoh in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing Pharaoh in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in the life of the dreamer, who may be a relative or a friend. And whoever sees that he has He became a Pharaoh, and it is clear that he has reached a position of leadership and prestige, but he is corrupting his religion. Seeing Pharaoh in the best condition indicates the bad condition of the imam or the bad condition of the president and the subjects. Dreaming of Pharaoh in a bad condition indicates the good condition of the imam and the parishioners. To see yourself talking with the Pharaoh is It indicates the outbreak of disputes and marital or family quarrels. Seeing Pharaonic antiquities in a dream means wealth and fortune for the pioneer. What is the interpretation of a Pharaoh seeing an unmarried woman? Seeing statues of the Pharaohs in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that they are pursuing their dreams. Seeing statues of the Pharaohs in a girl’s dream means that she will find... A job opportunity brings her a lot of money. If a girl sees ancient pharaohs, this indicates her marriage to an evil man. Seeing the tombs of the Pharaohs for unmarried women indicates that they heard good and happy news. What is the interpretation of seeing a Pharaoh for a married woman? Seeing the Pharaohs in a woman’s dream For a married woman, it indicates many worries and sorrows. If a married woman sees the gold of the Pharaohs, this indicates that her husband will be promoted. If a married woman sees that she is worshiping an idol, this indicates her pursuit of falsehood and her distance from God’s path. If a married woman sees that she is wearing the clothes of the Pharaohs, this indicates On her wealth and her acquisition of a lot of money. What is the interpretation of seeing Pharaoh in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing the tombs of the Pharaohs indicates that he heard the news of her happiness. Seeing a pregnant mummy in a dream indicates a difficult period and problems in pregnancy and childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing Pharaoh in a dream for a divorced woman? Shaking hands with a Pharaoh in a divorced woman’s dream means that she will receive a great benefit. Seeing the tombs of the Pharaohs in a divorced woman’s dream indicates a promotion at work, a prestigious position with a financial reward, or obtaining a large inheritance. Seeing the Pharaohs’ gold indicates many good things that she will obtain in the period Coming from her life. Seeing statues of the Pharaoh in a dream indicates a way out of financial distress. What is the interpretation of seeing a Pharaoh’s wife in a dream? Seeing a Pharaoh’s wife in a dream means that you will get a lot of money without getting tired and that you will become rich after poverty. Seeing a person transformed To Pharaoh indicates promotion at work and the many benefits that will come. What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a mummy? Seeing a mummy in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates

title: A dead person urinates in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a dead person urinating on himself in a dream and a dead person urinating on a living person in a dream

preview.html: Urinating a dead person in a dream Urination is the process through which the body gets rid of toxins and excess water present in the body and is expelled from the body through the bladder. Search for an explanation for this and we will mention in our article all the interpretations of this vision. And the urine of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dead person urinating in a dream? Seeing the urine of a deceased person symbolizes the livelihood that the dreamer will obtain, even if he complains of worry and anxiety, so the vision portends the cessation of these worries, and it can The vision is a sign for the living to remind him of prayers and mercy. And charity. If the urine of the dead person in the dream has an unacceptable odor, this indicates that the dead person must read the Qur’an, because he committed many sins and transgressions and God wants to alleviate his torment. When a man sees that one of his parents has urinated in his house, the dream foretells With the discovery and abundance of livelihood that will occur in reality and that his financial circumstances will change for the better in the near future. If the dreamer is barren and sees her mother urinating in her sleep, this is a good omen for her that God will soon grant her the blessing of childbearing. And the dead person’s urine in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the dead Urinating in a dream is evidence that the deceased had a debt before his death and has not paid his debt yet, so his children must pay the debt until he is released. Spirit. One of the interpretations of a deceased person urinating in a dream is that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and that God will give him goodness and blessings in his life. If the dreamer knows a deceased person, but they are not related to him, and he sees him in a dream urinating on him, then this dream symbolizes that the dreamer will marry one of the daughters of this deceased person. An Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. A dead person urinates in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees her father urinating and defecating with him in a dream, the vision is not auspicious, and indicates that her father He is being tortured in his grave, and he needs prayer and charity to ease his torment. This vision must be taken seriously and help provided so that God forgives her sins. If she sees that her deceased mother is urinating in a dream, this indicates that she will be blessed with abundant goodness that knows no bounds, and God will compensate her for all the hardships that she went through in her life. A dead person urinates in a dream on a married woman. If A married woman was suffering from disagreements with her husband in reality and saw her dead mother urinating on her bed. This dream indicates the return of stability and calm in her life. If she was looking for pregnancy and saw the previous vision, this is an indication that she will become pregnant and give birth to healthy and healthy children. The deceased urinated in a dream About a pregnant woman: Among the interpretations of seeing a corpse urinating in a pregnant woman’s dream, which is good news and happiness for her, is that she will go through her pregnancy and childbirth safely, and that God will grant her child health and well-being. The dream indicates the abundance and goodness that this woman and her husband will obtain and that her husband will receive a lot of money or money. He has a prestigious job and holds a high position, and if he is opposed to her husband, the dream shows he is settled

The dream indicates the abundance and goodness that this woman and her husband will obtain and that her husband will receive a lot of money or money. He has a prestigious job and holds a high position, and if he is opposed to her husband, the dream shows he is settled

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about roses for a single woman from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about roses for single womenMost of the time, it brings her a lot of good things to her personal or professional life, because roses generally bring joy to the soul and make a person feel contentment, grace, and love. Interpretation of a dream about roses for single womenInterpretation of a dream about roses for single women indicates that she will soon enjoy happiness and comfort in Her life, the result of her diligence and exhaustion in different ways. Roses in a dream also indicate the fulfillment of desires. Sometimes a dream about roses symbolizes the approaching marriage of someone and here the dreamer should thank Almighty God for this blessing and try to preserve it and create a stable home. Interpretation of a dream about roses for a single woman Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about roses has many meanings related to the dreamer’s life, including evil, such as seeing cut roses, as it appears that the dreamer is exposed to something sad, which causes her to live a period of depression and psychological tension. Some of them are good, such as seeing white roses in a dream, as this indicates the self-esteem of the visionary and her possession of a strong personality, which gives her the ability to do many things that she thinks are difficult. A girl may dream that she has a band of roses in her hair, and here the dream of roses symbolizes the imminent marriage by order. God Almighty.Interpretation of a dream about a bouquet of roses for unmarried women. A bouquet of roses in a single girl’s dream can symbolize that the viewer hears good news, whether this news concerns her personally or a person dear to her heart, or the dream can indicate that the girl has a good reputation. Between people. As a result of her commitment to doing the right thing and feeling for those around her, she must continue at this stage, may God bless her. The dreamer may dream that she is sleeping with a bouquet of roses next to her, and here the dream of roses may indicate that this girl is living a love story with someone, and she should not pass over it. Her boundaries with him before she proposed to him. And he marries her so that God will bless her in her life and make her happy. Interpretation of a dream about pink roses for a single woman: If the dreamer is still studying, then the dream about pink roses is evidence that she will be able to pass her exams with great success and high grades, so she should not feel anxious and stressed and put more effort into studying and studying. But if the dreamer is working, then dreaming about pink roses indicates that the dreamer is entering a new business and that he needs to be careful and pay attention to various matters so that he can succeed and collect a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about picking roses for one womanPicking roses in a dream from tree branches can give the dreamer A warning that she will go through a very difficult time, as she may cry a lot and fall into a severe depression due to losing some important things in her life, but she must. Do not give in to sadness and turn to Almighty God to overcome this psychological pain. preview.html: The funeral prayer for someone close to the dreamer indicates psychological crises and problems and also indicates their death soon, God willing. We will see more interpretations from the dream interpreter’s website, so stay with us. Interpretation of the funeral prayer in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream, she enters the funeral of one of her relatives and prays there while she is Sad. It is reported that this single girl will go through a very difficult time in her life during this time, and God knows best. Either you see in the dream the unmarried girl praying the funeral prayer for an unknown person and being sad. This is an indication that this single girl is going through some problems in her life and is unable to get rid of And God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that he is looking at the funeral prayer from a far away place in the dream, and he did not approach her in the dream. The meaning indicates that he will go through a period of great sadness during this period, and will go through bad circumstances. And seeing an unmarried woman in The dream is that she entered and left the funeral prayer, and did not complete it in the dream while she was sad. It explains that she will face many psychological crises in her life, but she will succeed in getting rid of them. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the funeral prayer in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of attending the funeral prayer in a dream for a married woman, if she sees A married woman dreamed that the funeral prayer was in the dream, and she looked at it without approaching it. This indicates that she is afraid of some of the things that she is facing in her life during this time and that she is sad about that. And if the married woman dreams that she is performing the funeral prayer for a stranger in the dream This explains the presence of many good deeds that this married woman will do in her life, God willing. Either a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the funeral prayer for her loved ones in the dream and she is sad. This indicates that she will go through many difficult circumstances in her life during this time, and God knows best. A married woman is looking for the funeral prayer in a dream, but she did not find it in the dream and she is worried. It indicates that he will face severe psychological crises at this time and will be very sad. Interpretation of seeing the funeral prayer in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman dreams that her ex-husband invited her to pray the funeral of one of her relatives in a dream. It indicates However, this divorced woman will face some problems during this period and she will grieve over them. If the divorced woman sees in a dream many close people gathering for the funeral prayer in the dream and she sees them. It indicates that this divorced woman will suffer a lot from the bad circumstances that she will see and experience. The divorced dreamer in the dream He searches for the funeral prayer to pray in a dream and does not find it. It indicates the goodness that this divorced woman will experience in her next life, God willing. And the divorced woman who searches for the funeral prayer in a dream and she prays it over a stranger. It indicates a major psychological crisis that this divorced woman will go through in her life. Read also: Interpretation of funeral prayer in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of funeral prayer in a dream for a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the funeral prayer was for one of those close to him in the dream. This indicates that he will face many bad deeds in this dream.

title: Interpretation of a sheep in a dream - Seeing a sheep in a dream - Interpretation of a dream about a sheep

preview.html: Seeing a lamb for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or single person, white or black, a goat ram, buying or eating lamb from the butchers in the market, cooking the slaughter, hunting for me, hunting Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a sheep in a dream: A sheep in a dream indicates that the male child obeys his parents. If you give a sheep while it is pregnant, it will give birth to an obedient male. Whoever sees that he is slaughtering a sheep, his son will die. Or he died born to one of his family members. Sheep If you dream that a sheep is following you, this is a bad omen. You expect things from him that will cause you sadness. If you see a sheep quietly grazing, it means that you will have influential friends who will do everything in their power for your good and success. If you dream that you are shearing the wool of a sheep, this is a sign of a period of vitality and profit, which will flood you with projects and business. If you see flocks of sheep, this indicates joy and happiness for farmers and prosperity and success in other industries. If you see a weak, feeble and sick sheep, mismanagement of some of your plans will make you miserable, because they will not give the return expected from them. If you eat a sheep in a dream, evil people will harm you and arouse your feelings. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep by Ibn Shaheen. As for the sheep, it is interpreted as mercy and grace. Perhaps the sheep indicates the boy, and it was said that the dreamer expects it and that the dream will come true. The sheep is interpreted as goodness, grace, and happiness, and perhaps the sheep indicates the boy, and it was said That something the dreamer hopes will come and that the dream will come true. Interpretation of a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a sheep in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a lamb in a dream. A lamb in a dream is a good boy who is obedient to his parents. Whoever sees that he is slaughtering a sheep in his dream, his relative, friend, or someone he loves will die. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep according to Nablus. In the dream, a boy appears. An obedient male to his parents. If he gives him a sheep while she is pregnant, they will give him an obedient male, and whoever sees that he is slaughtering a sheep, a child will die. For him, or a child dies for someone from his family. Interpretation of the symbol of goats and sheep in a dream: Seeing a small sheep in a dream is a sign of youth and strength, and the bonds that coexist with it, the formation of friendships, acquaintances, love, etc., are manifestations that symbolize the age of youth. Seeing A sheep denotes a good son who is obedient to his mother and father. If a man sees in his dream that he is giving a sheep to another person, and this dreamer has a pregnant wife, then this dream promises him that he will have a male son who will be obedient to his parents. Seeing a sheep in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of the arrival of a groom who will He asks for her engagement. A man who sees in his dream that he is slaughtering a sheep, then this dream warns of the death of someone he loves, who may be his relative or friend. Seeing a sheep in the dream of an unmarried girl and an unmarried woman is a sign of the arrival of a groom, but this groom will be weak in character and will not be able To make decisions without the approval of his mother and father. The wife will be able to impose her control over him if this sheep is white and small. An unmarried woman seeing a black sheep in her dream is a sign of a fleeting love story that will end. It can be a symbol or sign of her beauty, youth, and elegance. A black sheep in a dream means her first love for a woman.

When a single girl sees a church burning, this may indicate the differences she faces socially or familially, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees in his dream that he falls from a church while it is burning, this may indicate a material loss or his exposure to losses, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream Listening to church hymns in a dream The interpretation of a dream of listening to church hymns in a dream may reflect average rates at work, and God knows best. If the dreamer hears church hymns in a dream, this may indicate concealment in the home, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself cleaning the church in a dream, this may be evidence of his closeness to Almighty God, as he can get closer to God and do what the Lord has commanded him to do, and God knows the unseen. If a pregnant woman sees herself As she cleans the church in a dream, this could be evidence that she is close to God and is doing what God has commanded her to do, and God knows the unseen. The UnseenIn the event that the dreamer sees himself eating in a church, this may indicate the difficulties he is going through, and God knows best. The interpretation of a dream about demolishing may differ. A church in a dream according to the dreamer’s religion, since if a Muslim sees a church being demolished, this may lead to committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas the demolition of a church may express the evil that befalls the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a Christian sees that the church has been demolished, this may lead to Goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing in a church in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing in a church in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing ablution in a church. However, seeing a church can lead to asceticism in this world, and God knows best. When you see a church, you may show sadness, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing vegetables in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing vegetables in a dream Interpretation of a dream about vegetables in a dream in detail. Vegetables are a group of leafy plants that contain many species. They are plants with a happy shape because they contain many colors, as there are green, red, purple, white and other vegetables. Vegetables are the basis of life on earth because they reflect many benefits to human health, and vegetables are one of the most important nutrients that are recommended to be eaten daily and in sufficient quantities. It is an important source of fiber and antioxidants. Vegetables reduce the chances of developing chronic diseases, including heart attacks or narrowing of the arteries. It has meanings and implications that we will show you in detail. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin explained seeing vegetables in a dream as evidence of kindness and goodness in general. Seeing spoiled vegetables in a dream means great sadness and great grief. It states that the dreamer is exposed to many crises and problems. Seeing him eating vegetables in a dream is a sign of great success and wealth for the dreamer. Eating sweet-tasting vegetables in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessing. Eating sweet and bitter vegetables in a dream is a sign of evil and torture. Selling vegetables in a dream is a sign of sadness and distress. The severity of sadness is measured by the amount of vegetables sold in the dream. If the vegetable seller is sick, this indicates that the dreamer will recover from the illness in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream about seeing vegetables in a dream: If you see an artichoke in a dream, this means anxiety and sadness. If you see turnips in a dream, this means pain and sadness. Seeing cooked onions in a dream means repentance, and seeing cauliflower with eggs means that the dreamer marries women. Seeing cabbage in a dream indicates people's distress and sadness. Seeing eggplant in a dream means anxiety And sadness. Seeing garlic in a dream indicates bad slander. Seeing dill in a dream means kindness and benefit. Seeing someone eating peas in a dream is an unfortunate dream for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables for a single woman: Vegetables in an unmarried girl's dream are a sign that she will propose her engagement to a righteous man who fears God and lives with him a decent and happy life. Eating fresh vegetables in a girl's dream is a sign of decay, distraction and sadness. Buying vegetables in a dream is an indication of the goodness and money that the girl will get in the coming days. Selling vegetables in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence that she will suffer from some worries and problems in her life. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables for a married woman: Buying fresh vegetables in a dream for a married woman is a sign of goodness for her and her husband. Eggplant in a married woman's dream is an indication that she will suffer from sadness, illusion and pain, and onions in a married woman's dream are evidence of her involvement in bad things that may lead to divorce. Eating vegetables with her husband in a married woman's dream is evidence of her husband's love for her and evidence that she will live a calm, stable and happy life with him. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables for a pregnant woman: The interpretation of dreams to see fresh vegetables in a woman's dream The holder is a guide

Buying vegetables in a dream is an indication of the goodness and money that the girl will get in the coming days. Selling vegetables in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence that she will suffer from some worries and problems in her life. Interpretation of a dream about vegetables for a married woman: Buying fresh vegetables in a dream for a married woman is a sign of goodness for her and her husband. Eggplant in a married woman's dream is an indication that she will suffer from sadness, illusion and pain, and onions in a married woman's dream are evidence of her involvement in bad things that may lead to divorce. Eating vegetables with her husband in a married woman's dream is evidence of her husband's love for her and evidence that she will live a calm, stable and happy life with him.
